locations.title: Love's Travel Stop
locations.content: Love's Travel Stop may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Spent hundreds of dollars fueling and then went inside to get a shower. I pull up the app on my phone to scan my barcode and the old lady behind the counter says "you gotta have your physical card". That's insane. We're expected to carry …
I just discovered Loves no longer give shower credits when get 50 Gallons or more. Warner is the only trucking company that gets any privileges. Told here to me by an associate.
Shower big and clean. Parking lot small.

showerReviews.reviewText: … delivery to Walmart. Not a bad place the food is decent. However I didn't take a shower I went across the street to loves where it was free. A lot of traffic though because the Walmart Distribution center down the street. But all in all …

Came in today got a shower for $10. Not bad shower. Towels not provided. Was just missed I guess. Asked how long fish been up and they replied 3 hour. I asked for a fresh piece and was denied.  Cashier says Illinois law allows cooked foods …
Great place to take a 10. The Breakfast is absolutely delicious. I highly recommend this place. Love's is across the street if you don't mind a walk to use your shower credits.

… to add to the truck supply/repair inventory. The customer service was excellent, the shower was clean, there was food available, and the parking lot wasn't a disaster area like many other stops. I personally don't ask for much more. Thank …

… little truck stop. I've always been able to get parking it seem like most people go to the walmart DC down the street so trucks are always on the move. Shower nice and clean and spacious there is a $5 cash deposit. The women bathroom is …

I only gave it a star because it’s a good spot just to park, took a shower and it was disgusting the toilet wasn’t flush and looked like someone used it a while ago and there was bugs flying around in the shower needless to say I didn’t eat …

Only truck stop around Olney, IL.  They have upgraded the inside, and the food is decent.  The shower was clean and the water pressure strong. It would be great if they put a fan in the shower, it gets pretty hot and it would be nice not to …

Bathroom was extremely disgusting. Store was dirty in general.  I could see parking here but I wouldn’t want to eat here or shower here.  I would post pictures of the restroom but it would get flagged.  I asked the guy at the counter if it …

5$ deposit for a 10$ shower lol great place though and its 2 miles from Wal Mart DC. I arrived at 1am and it was full. Got creative with parking and parked next to the driveway in front of the fuel lanes right under the store sign and no …
Bathrooms need upgrading way to small for a truck stop otherwise very nice. Shower toilet also very small. Us guys are rubbing against the inside of the bowl which puts us at risk of disease.

showerReviews.reviewText: If I knew this place had no showers, I would've went to one of the other truck stops across the street.  Flying j is starting to let me down so often I am going to try to avoid them for a good while.  Every flying j is doing this when they …

Very unhappy with the service.. I drive 300mi and just want to grab food and a shower.... WHY IS THE FOOD PUT LAST?? OFalf of the signs shouldn't be up in the hot box because that food isn't there.. I asked for two spicy chicken bacon …
Shower doors have no safety latch and peep space between the wall and the door. Very concerning. Also the fan in the shower room is broken.

… at the Denny's and leaving a tip, returned to truck and told had to leave no parking .  Not coming here ever. And not ever leaving shower tips or patronize any restaurant at any truck stop. But for sure nothing to ever do with this flying j

… from last night (a blond with glasses) for her pleasant attitude. And a BIG shout out the the shower attendants that were there last night and this morning! These guys are pleasant, and actually takes pride in their work. Showers …

The shower was clean, great pressure and plenty of hot water. Store was okay, I'm giving five stars because even though there was only one person running the store when there should have been probably three, Patty was doing an outstanding …

… Bathrooms dirty as hell, I was thinking of getting a shower, but after seeing the bathrooms, I can only imagine that the towels they give you are the same ones the use to clean the floors like many other P/FJs do

It gets packed at night with 2 freeways intersecting 5 miles away... but the food was excellent, the fuel is always top notch for me, and the shower was impeccably clean but the showerhead needed replacement. Other than that no complaints …

Got up at 4am (3/10/22) to take a shower.  Used the app and got inside and it seemed only 1 employee was working.  She was very nice and apologetic saying all showers were dirty and the maintenance guy was late.  (I guess meaning he was due …

Clean showers with great water pressure BUT shower did not close and lock, and seemed like not one was working (no one in the back for the showers or up front at the registers). Ended up having to jam the door closed with the trash can

showerReviews.reviewText: 7/21/25 17:00 Shower #6 - Great air conditioning in the shower room and it was clean. …

… has plenty of snacks, and their fountain drinks are the best I've had from other truck stops. I will say bathrooms need more attending to. Other than that, it's a decent stop! The shower was cleaned, and fresh hot towels were ready as well.
The employees are amazing. But the facility is seriously lacking. Just stop for a quick shower. Then, I wanted to get back on the road. …

… finding a spot (NO JOKE). The cashier was disrespectful and gave attitude when I didn't use my shower in time (even when I asked politely for her to renew since I am new to this Ultra membership). The showers were dirty and towels smelled …

Great shower, don’t know if they were renovated recently. Disappointed that the restaurant wasn’t open, but understood. probably the nicest staff and the shop is clean, which I can’t say about a lot of TA’s shops, parking lot clean and …
I had to use the restroom,,so I used a shower credit just so I can poop alone without smelling someone else poop in the stall next to me !! I feel amazing
Parking lot including reserved filled up about 8pm! Why are you banging on people’s doors at 12 midnight for some damn parking. Extremely ridiculous. I’ll pay for a shower at pilot next time. …

… $1000/week. I'm not paying for parking because you have half your lot as reserved. Nor will I buy any fuel at this TA. Nor will I spend any money here. I'll stop to shower and leave. You're definitely losing more than the cost of parking. …
The shower was decent. …

This place is disgusting. I would give a negative star rating if I could. The showers were horrible. Toilet seat was not the proper size (too small) there was what looked like pubic hair all over the base of the toilet, hairballs all over …
